title: Baked apples with Calvados sauce
description: This easy baked apple recipe is pure autumnal pleasure - especially with a dribble of good calvados.
ingredients: 4 Reines des Reinettes apples, or similar russet apples, washed, dried
40g/1½oz Braeburn apple, peeled, cut into 0.5cm/¼in dice
½ tsp arrowroot, diluted in a little water
